overview:
## Discussion

Allowing a navigation response with a MIME type that WebKit can’t display causes the navigation to fail.

# response

**Instance Property**

The frame’s response.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var response: URLResponse { get }
```

## Discussion

Allowing a navigation response with a MIME type that WebKit can’t display causes the navigation to fail.
title: response
